title: Legacy Client Doesn't Work AT ALL
body:
Hello, 

I tried using the new client for a while, and it's alright but there are too many pet peeves I have with it and it is laggy sometimes. So I tried to go back to the legacy client but it doesn't work at all. Nothing happens when I click 'Launch Legacy Client' on the new login screen, and nothing happens when I try and use the old launcher. The only way I can get it to work is if I repair the old launcher and even then it will only work once, if I close and reopen it I have to repair again if I want to use it again. 

Any help? I would really like to use the legacy client I prefer it much more. I would just like it to work like it used too, without having to repair it every time I play.

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is having a hard time reaching our Legacy Client platform. This is most likely caused by an *unstable connection* as a result of network settings that simply don't play nicely with League. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are in the clear.

Let me know if you experience further issues with this after taking those steps.

Thanks for the reply. After I finish up some work I will look at those steps. Thanks, i'll get back to you with the results later.
PS; last night after I made this post I did a complete re install. It functioned the same way the repairs do, with it only working once and all.
